segments.text: We guarantee our product for two years .

segments.text: How about the repairs after the warranty expire ? Are you responsible for the fixing if the machine breaks down after the warranty period ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . All repairs are billed at cost . We'll only bill you for parts . The on-site service is $ 300 a year after the warranty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will you supply spare parts if we want them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . We always have the interest of the customers at heart .
